body_html:
@jart I don't follow. That appears to work, yeah, but I don't get why?

Do you mean put it in the gentoo ebuild instead of upstreaming things? Then other distros don't benefit and everyone packaging TF has to duplicate the work.

Or you mean to put all the rules in one big workspace instead of separate? That works but makes toggling each dep separately more complicated. Maybe not everyone can unbundle everything so all--or-none seems less flexible.
